wikipedia_page.main: Keith Bannister (27 January 1923 – 13 March 2012) was an English professional footballer who played as a right back in the Football League for Sheffield Wednesday and Chesterfield and in non-League football for King's Lynn and Macclesfield.

response: *Keith Bannister (footballer, born 1923), English former professional footballer

*Keith Bannister, 89, English footballer.["The Wednesday Boys", Jason Dickinson & John Brodie, Pickard Communication, , pages 199, Gives general biography.]
* Keith Bannister (footballer, born 1923) (1923–2012), English football right back (Sheffield Wednesday, Chesterfield)
* Keith Bannister (footballer, born 1930) (1930–2016), English football wing half (Birmingham, Wrexham, Chesterfield, etc)
